DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy sodium bicarbonate plus N-acetylcysteine prevention contrast-induced nephropathy .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Hydration With Sodium Bicarbonate Long-Term Clinical Outcomes Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease Undergoing Emergent Coronary Procedure
DOC.criteria: patient chronic renal failure ( serum creatinine > 1.1mg/dl ) undergo elective percutaneous coronary intervention administer sodium bicarbonate and/or Nacetylcysteine and/or contrast medium within 72 hour . pregnancy congestive heart failure allergy sodium bicarbonate and/or Nacetylcysteine hemodialysis
